channel.title: Documentation
channel.description: pwndbg (/paʊnˈdiˌbʌɡ/) is a GDB plug-in that makes debugging with GDB suck less, with a focus on features needed by low-level software developers, hardware hackers, reverse-engineers and exploit developers.

item.title: Pwndbg coding sprints report
item.author: disconnect3d
item.description: Report of the two coding sprints with Pwndbg
